job.title: Senior Frontend Software Engineer
job.description: there is only one data cloud snowflakes founders started from scratch and designed a data platform built for the cloud that is effective affordable and accessible to all data users but it didnt stop there they engineered snowflake to power the data cloud where thousands of organizations unlock the value of their data with nearunlimited scale concurrency and performance this is our vision a world with endless insights to tackle the challenges and opportunities of today and reveal the possibilities of tomorrowltbrgtltbrgthow do you make the worlds most powerful cloud data platform a delight to use we are the fastest growing software company at this scale in history and looking to push that to new heights by building the single best visual user experience in the industryltbrgtltbrgtthe snowflake data cloud is the first to realize the full potential of the massive new data economy we were the first to introduce truly frictionless data sharing have a rapidly growing data marketplace and monetization platform and are powering the most complete analytics platform with a seamless and intuitive visual experience powerful data visualizations and world class management interfaceltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for talented frontend engineers to help us continue to grow and build compelling new experiences using a bestofbreed tech stack reacthooks typescript nodejs kubernetes go bring your passion for delighting customers and deep experience building cutting edge web apps and help us build the future of the data cloudltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtas a senior front end engineer you willltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtlead and drive projects that span our stack including go and node services hosted in kubernetes and a ui written in typescript and reacthooksltligtltligtpromote strong collaboration within a cross functional team including design product managementltligtltligtdeliver features requiring close coordination with several sister teams such as data sharing cloud infrastructure and crossregion replication ltligtltligtbe a strong contributor to the product vision and drive team planningltligtltligtmentor and coach junior team performance and scaleltligtltligtdemonstrated technical leadership experience such as being an architect or tech lead for high impact customer facing projectsltligtltligtexperience in modern technologies such as javascript typescript react angular node ltligtltligtexperience with canvas svg and other visualization toolslibraries a plus ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtwhy join the engineering
